description: A cave on Punk Hazard island where the Straw Hat Pirates take shelter with the giant children and captured Brownbeard. This is where Chopper makes his critical discovery about the children's drug addiction.

keyEvents.title: Straw Hats Hide in Cave with Brownbeard
keyEvents.description: The Straw Hat Pirates and children use this cave as a temporary refuge while questioning Brownbeard about the Master.
keyEvents.significance: Provides the setting for Chopper's discovery of the children's addiction.

keyEvents.title: Chopper Discovers NHC10 Addiction in Cave
keyEvents.description: Chopper examines the children in the cave and discovers they have been addicted to NHC10.
keyEvents.significance: Location of one of the most important revelations in the Punk Hazard arc.

keyEvents.title: Children Attack in Cave
keyEvents.description: The addicted children attack the Straw Hats inside the cave during withdrawal.
keyEvents.significance: Site of conflict between the Straw Hats and the children they're trying to save.

name.japanese: パンクハザード研究所

description: Caesar Clown's research facility on Punk Hazard where he conducts his experiments and conducts business with criminal associates.

keyEvents.title: Law Gives Smoker's Heart to Caesar in Laboratory
keyEvents.description: Inside the laboratory, Trafalgar Law hands Smoker's heart to Caesar Clown.
keyEvents.significance: Location where Caesar gains control over the Marine Vice Admiral.

keyEvents.title: Yeti Cool Brothers Dispatched from Laboratory
keyEvents.description: Caesar sends the Yeti Cool Brothers from his laboratory to eliminate the Straw Hats.
keyEvents.significance: Command center for Caesar's operations against the Straw Hats.

description: The frozen, snowy mountainous region of Punk Hazard where extreme cold conditions prevail. This is where Zoro, Sanji, and Brook search for Kin'emon.

keyEvents.title: Zoro, Sanji, and Brook Search Mountains
keyEvents.description: The three Straw Hats search the snowy mountains for Kin'emon's torso.
keyEvents.significance: Sets up their encounter with the Yeti Cool Brothers.

keyEvents.title: Trio Found Unconscious in Snow
keyEvents.description: Zoro, Sanji, and Brook are discovered unconscious in the snow surrounded by giant footprints.
keyEvents.significance: Location where the Yeti Cool Brothers demonstrate their threat level.

statusHistory.reason: Mountain region is part of Punk Hazard
